snippet.title: Idle Dungeon Tycoon gameplay
snippet.description:
Idle Dungeon Tycoon gameplay
► Suscríbete https://goo.gl/FQjSjC para más gameplays
Become a real dungeon tycoon by managing your heroes and idle profit and defeat enough monsters to improve your heroes in this simulation game!
Expand your dungeon empire and boost your collection by automating your dungeons!
You can upgrade your heroes online and offline! Start training your heroes now!

Have you ever trained a hero? Stop asking how to train your hero!
Ready to embark on an exciting adventurous mission to acquire advance heroes.
The aim of this dungeon strategy simulator is to train the best heroes to deafeat as much monsters as possible:
with the income you make from the dungeon farm, you will have to train heroes and upgrade your dungeons and castle.
Become the best dungeon tycoon, build a millionaire dungeon empire, and earn a massive profit.
Get ready to train your heroes now in this dungeon tycoon simulator!

IDLE DUNGEON TYCOON:
★ Automate your dungeons to increase your idle income: Sit back and become the millionaire without tapping!
★ Get heroes and earn more heroes.
★ Train your heroes! You will be a dungeon tycoon in this game even offline!
★ Every hero has a special skill: Increase dungeon productivity!
★ Build up your idle dungeon empire simulation without the endless clicking you experience in other clicker games!
★ Manage dungeons in multiple different areas like a real boss: Become a dungeon tycoon by managing this dungeon empire!
★ Become a true hero trainer by training more than 40 heroes.
★ Farm different kinds of monsters: orcs, goblins and more.
★ Collect tons of gold in this dungeon and income management simulator!
★ No Internet connection needed: Get rich online or offline!


Android download Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kkgames.IdleDungeonTycoon
iOS app Store:

#IdleDungeonTycoon #gameplay
